Package server.unipr.it

Class ServerServiceStaff

java.lang.Object
server.unipr.it.ServerServiceStaff
public class ServerServiceStaff extends Object
The ServerServiceStaff class contains all method that a staff member needs to use to get access to database. For example here there's a method that a staff member use to store access to the software, contains a method that a staff member needs to drawn all payment that user made.
Author:
Spagni Alex Zuelli Arianna

  • Method Details

    • signUpStaff

      public int signUpStaff(RequestStaffSignUp rq)
      This method is used to check if username and password insert from a staff member are correct or not.
      Parameters:
      rq - an object that contains username and password to check.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Username and password correct.
      2)negative=Username and password not correct.

    • getAllPayments

      public ArrayList<javaClass.FeePayment> getAllPayments(int typeReq, ArrayList<javaClass.FeePayment> allPayments)
      This method is used to fetch payments that user made. Different payment will be fetched based on the type of request that a staff member made.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - an integer value that distinguish which request client has sent to the server.
      allPayments - list where we are going to add all payment drawn.
      Returns:
      It return an array list that contains all payment made.

    • getUsersMustPayFee

      public ArrayList<javaClass.Notification> getUsersMustPayFee(int typeReq, ArrayList<javaClass.Notification> notifications)
      This method is used to fetch all membership/storage fee that must be add into the database.
      Parameters:
      typeReq - an integer value that distinguish which request client has sent to the server.
      notifications - list where we are going to add all payment drawn.
      Returns:
      It return an array list that contains all membership/storage fee that have been fetched.

    • addUsersMustPayFee

      public int addUsersMustPayFee(RequestStaffAddPayments rq)
      This method is used to add membership/storage fee to the database.
      Parameters:
      rq - an object that contains all data of the fee that we have to store on the database.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Membership/Storage fee stored on the database.
      2)negative=Membership/storage fee not stored on the database.

    • getMembers

      public ArrayList<Member> getMembers(ArrayList<Member> members)
      This method is used to drawn all user from the database.
      Parameters:
      members - list where we are going to add all users drawn.
      Returns:
      It returns an array list that containt all user drawn.

    • manageMembersCredential

      public int manageMembersCredential(RequestStaffManageMember rq)
      This method is used to modify some information about a user in the database.
      Parameters:
      rq - object that contains new data, that we have to insert in the database and the id of the member, who's credential have to be changed.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Data changed correctly.
      2)negative=Data not changed correctly.

    • removeAMember

      public int removeAMember(RequestStaffManageMember rq)
      This method is used to remove a member from the database.
      Parameters:
      rq - object that contains the id of member we want to remove.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Member removed correctly.
      2)negative=Member not removed correctly.

    • simulateARace

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Race simulated correctly.
      2)negative=Race not simulated correctly.

    • sendFeeNotification

      public int sendFeeNotification(RequestStaffFeeNotification rq)
      This method is used send a notification to users that haven't paied their fees yet.
      Parameters:
      rq - object that contains data of the fee and the id of the member who's notification is directed to.
      Returns:
      It return an integer value:
      1)positive=Notification sent correctly.
      2)negative=Notification not sent correctly.
